description: Lists the hardware assets for the specified Outpost. Use filters to return specific results. If you specify multiple filters, the results include only the resources that match all of the specified filters. For a filter where you can specify multiple values, the results include items that match any of the values that you specify for the filter.

parameters.name: OutpostIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Outpost.

parameters.name: HostIdFilter
parameters.description: Filters the results by the host ID of a Dedicated Host. (string) ---

nested_items.name: AssetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset. An Outpost asset can be a single server within an Outposts rack or an Outposts server configuration.

nested_items.name: RackId
nested_items.description: The rack ID of the asset.

nested_items.name: HostId
nested_items.description: The host ID of the Dedicated Host on the asset.
ACTIVE - The asset is available and can provide capacity for new compute resources.
ISOLATED - The asset is undergoing maintenance and can't provide capacity for new compute resources. Existing compute resources on the asset are not affected.

RETIRING - The underlying hardware for the asset is degraded. Capacity for new compute resources is reduced. Amazon Web Services sends notifications for resources that must be stopped before the asset can be replaced.

nested_items.name: InstanceFamilies
nested_items.description: A list of the names of instance families that are currently associated with a given asset.

nested_items.name: InstanceTypeCapacities
nested_items.description: The instance type capacities configured for this asset. This can be changed through a capacity task.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: The number of each instance type.

nested_items.name: MaxVcpus
nested_items.description: The maximum number of vCPUs possible for the specified asset.

nested_items.name: AssetLocation
nested_items.description: The position of an asset in a rack.

nested_items.name: RackElevation
nested_items.description: The position of an asset in a rack measured in rack units.
